languages.text: {n}Глаза палача сверкают обожанием.{/n} "Праведные слова, о Звездное Сиятельство! Нет смысла в растрате драгоценных минут на ересь и мразь — оба были признаны виновными и будут преданы огню!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза палача сверкают обожанием.{/n} "Праведные слова, о {mf|Звездный Сын|Звездная Дочь}! Да простит ваше величие мой слабый, неумелый язык! Ни одного смерда не возвысили мы — лишь высшая знать да губернаторская свита были удостоены сей чести, клянусь".
traits.speaker: FW_Lawman

languages.text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза палача сверкают обожанием.{/n} "Праведные слова, о Звездное Сиятельство! Нет смысла в растрате драгоценных минут на ересь и мразь — оба были признаны виновными и будут преданы огню!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with adoration.{/n} "What righteous words, o Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy, both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

{n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

{n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

languages.text: {n}刽子手双眼闪烁着狂喜的光芒。{/n}“何等正义的话语，来自上界的大人！将宝贵的时间浪费在异端邪说上毫无意义。这两个人都犯下了重罪，让烈焰吞噬他们！”
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

traits.locale_text: {n}刽子手双眼闪烁着狂喜的光芒。{/n}“何等正义的话语，来自上界的大人！将宝贵的时间浪费在异端邪说上毫无意义。这两个人都犯下了重罪，让烈焰吞噬他们！”

languages.text: {n}Los ojos del verdugo brillan exaltados.{/n} «¡Sabias y virtuosas palabras, Excelencia Celestial! No tiene sentido malgastar un tiempo valioso con herejías. ¡Ambos han sido hallados culpables y serán pasto de las llamas!».
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos del verdugo brillan exaltados.{/n} «¡Sabias y virtuosas palabras, Excelencia Celestial! No tiene sentido malgastar un tiempo valioso con herejías. ¡Ambos han sido hallados culpables y serán pasto de las llamas!».

languages.text: {n}Celladın gözleri coşkuyla parlıyor.{/n} "Ne adil sözler Semavi Efendimiz! Kâfirlikle değerli dakikaları boşa harcamanın anlamı yok. İkisi de suçlu bulundu, alevlere teslim edilecekler!"
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Celladın gözleri coşkuyla parlıyor.{/n} "Ne adil sözler Semavi Efendimiz! Kâfirlikle değerli dakikaları boşa harcamanın anlamı yok. İkisi de suçlu bulundu, alevlere teslim edilecekler!"

languages.text: {n}処刑人の目は高揚した様子でキラリと光る。{/n}「何と素晴らしい言葉でしょうか、天の閣下！異端者に貴重な時間を費やすことはありません。両者とも罪は明らかであり、炎に委ねられます！」
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

traits.locale_text: {n}処刑人の目は高揚した様子でキラリと光る。{/n}「何と素晴らしい言葉でしょうか、天の閣下！異端者に貴重な時間を費やすことはありません。両者とも罪は明らかであり、炎に委ねられます！」

languages.text: {n}Les yeux du bourreau brillent d'un éclat exalté.{/n} « Voilà qui est admirablement bien parlé, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Inutile de perdre de précieuses minutes sur l'autel de l'hérésie. Les deux accusés ont été reconnus coupables et vont être livrés aux flammes ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux du bourreau brillent d'un éclat exalté.{/n} « Voilà qui est admirablement bien parlé, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Inutile de perdre de précieuses minutes sur l'autel de l'hérésie. Les deux accusés ont été reconnus coupables et vont être livrés aux flammes ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Henkers funkeln vor Begeisterung.{/n} "Was für rechtschaffene Worte, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Es bringt nichts, wertvolle Minuten auf Ketzerei zu vergeuden. Beide wurden für schuldig befunden und werden den Flammen übergeben!"
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner's eyes gleam with exaltation.{/n} "What righteous words, Your Celestial Highness! There is no point in wasting precious minutes on heresy. Both have been found guilty and will be consigned to the flames!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Henkers funkeln vor Begeisterung.{/n} "Was für rechtschaffene Worte, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Es bringt nichts, wertvolle Minuten auf Ketzerei zu vergeuden. Beide wurden für schuldig befunden und werden den Flammen übergeben!"
